holidays.title: May Day
holidays.description: A day for everyone to come together and celebrate life as we know it!

holidays.title: Beltane
holidays.description: Let’s heal the world with fire and celebrate the beautiful festival of Beltane.

holidays.title: Calan Mai
holidays.description: Celebrate this day with the lighting of bonfires to fend off evil spirits and witches.

holidays.title: Couple Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Pamper your partner on Couple Appreciation Day. Let them know they’re a priority in your life.

holidays.title: CSS Reboot Day
holidays.description: Celebrate CSS Reboot Day by doing the webmasters' bidding for a day.

holidays.title: Early May Bank Holiday
holidays.description: Put off your banking chores and spend the day relaxing this Early May Bank Holiday.

holidays.title: Executive Coaching Day
holidays.description: Join us in celebrating those who taught us to get the best out of our professional life.

holidays.title: Frequent Flyer Day
holidays.description: Enjoy the perks of being a frequent flyer of any airline on Frequent Flyer Day.

holidays.title: Global Love Day
holidays.description: Celebrate yourself and all humanity through acts of love, and promote peace and unity.

holidays.title: Great Lakes Awareness Day
holidays.description: We're swimming in cool new ideas to celebrate Great Lakes Awareness Day; check them out.

holidays.title: International Doodle Dog Day
holidays.description: Enjoy a day of fun and excitement with your poodle-mix this International Doodle Dog Day!

holidays.title: International Sunflower Guerilla Gardening Day
holidays.description: Celebrate International Sunflower Guerilla Gardening Day by planting sunflowers on a vacant lot near you.

holidays.title: Keep Kids Alive Drive 25 Day
holidays.description: Raise drivers' awareness, practice safe driving behaviors, and make roads safer for all.

holidays.title: Labour and Agriculture Day
holidays.description: Agriculture is crucial for the survival of living beings. That’s why we celebrate this amazing day.

holidays.title: Learn to Ride a Bike Day
holidays.description: If you've always wanted to learn how to ride a bike, today is a perfect time.

holidays.title: Lei Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Lei Day by immersing yourself in Hawaiian culture and the spirit of aloha.

holidays.title: Marshall Islands Constitution Day
holidays.description: Get ready for Marshall Islands Constitution Day with our great article celebrating the Marshall Islands.

holidays.title: Melanoma Monday
holidays.description: Melanoma, the deadliest type of skin cancer, is developed by 1 out of every 50 Americans.

holidays.title: National Black Barber Shop Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Let us understand the importance of the day and join in the activities to celebrate.

holidays.title: National Blessing Day
holidays.description: Celebrate and appreciate the Blessings all over the world on this special day.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Parfait Day
holidays.description: Get your dessert spoons ready for National Chocolate Parfait Day!

holidays.title: National Infertility Survival Day
holidays.description: Parents or not, today is the day we celebrate everyone and show them support.

holidays.title: National Loyalty Day
holidays.description: On National Loyalty Day, Americans showcase their loyalty to their country.

holidays.title: National Mantra Day
holidays.description: National Mantra Day promotes the use of mantras to ease the mind.

holidays.title: National Mother Goose Day
holidays.description: Today, we are swept back to memories of our childhood fairy tales.

holidays.title: National Open Farm Day
holidays.description: Agriculture and farming are critical for humanity’s survival, and here’s why!

holidays.title: National Purebred Dog Day
holidays.description: National Purebred Dog Day celebrates the history, purpose, and future of purebred dogs.

holidays.title: National Rotate Your Beer Day
holidays.description: After water and tea, beer is the third most-consumed drink in the world.

holidays.title: New Home Owners Day
holidays.description: Celebrate your dream home with your entire family this New Home Owners Day.

holidays.title: Philippines Labor Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Philippines Labor Day in style and honor the workers who fought for their rights!

holidays.title: Phone in Sick Day
holidays.description: Join the Phone in Sick Day celebrations, and let us honor the worker and his rights.

holidays.title: Save The Rhino Day
holidays.description: We’ve got all you need to know about rhinos and how you can help save them.

holidays.title: School Principals' Day
holidays.description: Make your principal feel special on School Principals’ Day.

holidays.title: Silver Star Service Banner Day
holidays.description: Pay tribute to the brave on Silver Star Service Banner Day.

holidays.title: Therapeutic Massage Awareness Day
holidays.description: Take advantage of the day, and get yourself a massage to help get rid of stress.

holidays.title: Worthy Wage Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the value of teachers by joining the fair compensation movement on Worthy Wage Day.

holidays.title: Charli D'Amelio’s Birthday
holidays.description: This TikTok superstar had a Dunkin’ Donuts limited go-to drink offer named after her.

holidays.title: Gianna Bryant’s Birthday
holidays.description: The ‘Mambacita’ angel was a kind, passionate player and a caring daughter — a true inspiration.

holidays.title: Katya Zamolodchikova’s Birthday
holidays.description: This drag superstar placed in two seasons of “Ru Paul’s Drag Race.”

holidays.title: Paeka’s Birthday
